title: Which is better for CSE ?
content:
PES EC CSE (23 km away + bus stop's also 2.5 km away or, bmtc bus travel would take nearly 2-2.5 hrs)  
BMSCE CSE  & DSCE CSE (are relatively easier to travel, and would take 40 min- 1hr)  
(Need an unbiased opinion for this.)

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/1dvqswm)

comments.body:
Overall everything is the same(even placements)except for some factors between BMSCE CSE, PES EC CSE

college life(BMSCE>PES)

Academics(PES>BMSCE)

Fees(PES>BMSCE)

Pick PES only if you are getting it through CET. Otherwise, go for BMSCE. Similar reputed colleges, and similar placements, but BMSCE offers a better college life and costs less. However PES crowd is unmatched but the place is academically too rigorous (good for some, bad for some).
Ok thanks. Although, for my case: fees â€” BMSCE (comedk) > PES (cet) )
What is the difference in fees?
Comedk would be 3.12L/yr & kcet would be around 1.5L/yr
Isn't PES placement a little better than BMSCE

While writing the answer I assumed it was PES via PESSAT. If that had been the case then the slightly better placements wouldn't have been worth 20L extra in fees. 

Check my other comment where I said that if both are through CET then PES is the better option
